columns.name: destination_id
columns.description: The ID of the publishing destination.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the publishing destination.

columns.name: destination_arn
columns.description: The ARN of the resource to publish to.

columns.name: destination_type
columns.description: The type of publishing destination. Currently, only Amazon S3 buckets are supported.

columns.name: kms_key_arn
columns.description: The ARN of the KMS key to use for encryption.

columns.name: publishing_failure_start_timestamp
columns.description: The time, in epoch millisecond format, at which GuardDuty was first unable to publish findings to the destination.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of the publishing destination.
